dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 801 : Holding Company Registration Threshold Equalization Act of 2014
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to make the shareholder threshold for registration of savings and loan holding companies the same as for bank holding companies.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Holding Company Registration Threshold Equalization Act of 2014.

section.header: Registration threshold for savings and loan holding companies
section.text: The Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (15 U.S.C. 78a et seq.) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1)(B), by inserting after is a bank the following: , a savings and loan holding company (as defined in section 10 of the Home Owners' Loan Act),; and
in paragraph (4), by inserting after case of a bank the following: , a savings and loan holding company (as defined in section 10 of the Home Owners' Loan Act),; and

paragraph.text: in section 15(d), by striking case of bank and inserting the following: case of a bank, a savings and loan holding company (as defined in section 10 of the Home Owners' Loan Act),.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives January 14, 2014.
